definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
exhausting/hard/tough/arduous/to work hard/to go to a lot of trouble/hardship(s)
Arnold Schwarzenegger (1947-), US actor and politician, governor of California 2003-2011
Henry Kissinger (1923-), US academic and politician, Secretary of State 1973-1977
Xinhai Revolution (1911), which ended the Qing Dynasty

sentences.english: By the next day, Cindel was much better.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，辛德爾就好多了。

sentences.english: Karina and Cynthia are talking in Da-an Park.
sentences.chinese: 卡麗娜和辛西亞在大安森林公園聊天。

sentences.english: Then in wanders the unlucky Sing, who attempts to get money there.
sentences.chinese: 然而不明真相的辛試圖從那兒弄到錢。

sentences.english: A player on the sports team blew the whistle on the gambling scandal.
sentences.chinese: 體育隊的選手檢舉賭博弊案的祕辛。

sentences.english: Routes of Polar ocean development at the time of the ‘Krasin’.
sentences.chinese: “卡拉辛”時代的北冰洋開發路線。

sentences.english: Icebreaker ‘Krasin’ is a museum that could be visited during the Festival of Modern art held in a traditional museum.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以在現代藝術節期間參觀破冰船“卡拉辛”號。

sentences.english: Two-dimensional problems of thermo-viscoelasticity in the symplectic system were described.
sentences.chinese: 在辛體系下描述了二維熱粘彈性力學問題。

sentences.english: It is an anecdote never published.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個從未公佈的祕辛。

sentences.english: Larsen sotted. The doctor proposed him to take yoga for abstinence.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾辛嗜酒如命，醫生建議他採取瑜伽法戒酒。

sentences.english: The college grew into what is now Michigan State University in East Lansing.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校發展成爲如今位於東蘭辛的密歇根州大學。

sentences.english: It's quite out of my expectation that Cynthia just walked me off my feet.
sentences.chinese: 很出乎我意料的是辛西亞竟比我更擅長走路。

sentences.english: I've actually been eyeing that dress at Maxine's for a while now.
sentences.chinese: 我已經注意麥克辛服裝店的那件衣服一段時間了。

sentences.english: She helped clear Cindel of a terrible fever.
sentences.chinese: 在她的幫助下，辛德爾的高燒退去了。

sentences.english: Hinkel hasn't played in any of Germany's six games this season.
sentences.chinese: 近期德國隊的六場比賽，辛克爾一場都未參予到。

sentences.english: A few wines from Fixin are also in the appellation.
sentences.chinese: 少數菲克辛釀造的紅酒也適合這個等級。

definition: ninth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/ninth in order/letter "I" or Roman "IX" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 345°/nona
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
age/seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/seventh in order/letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 255°/hepta
6th earthly branch: 9-11 a.m., 4th solar month (5th May-5th June), year of the Snake/ancient Chinese compass point: 150°
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
